column4: I've been having trouble getting the correct resolution in gNome. The resolution works fine on the Live CD, so is there any way I can transfer over the config files to the harddrive?
make sure your resolution is listed there
it is, doesn't change a thing.
it might have something to do with your refresh rates
check what the correct horisontal and verticale rates are
you need to go advanced somewhere in there
I've done that as well. Is it possible to transfer over the setup from the live cd?
then copy the file i suppose
keep a backup of your current xorg.conf though
I'll try that, but theirs no way to do an copy of the live-cd onto the harddrive?
that is the only thing that matters
you can try using 3d drivers i suppose
